definition: (of a defendant) to respond to a charge/to defend oneself
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: the carrier against whom an action has been brought shall have the right to require the other carrier to join in the proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 被提起诉讼的承运人有权要求另一承运人参加应诉。

sentences.english: to undertake response representation to administrative reviews and administrative prosecutions.
sentences.chinese: 承担行政复议和行政诉讼的应诉代理工作等。

sentences.english: Under the english law a foreign sovereign has always been immune from suit in the english courts .
sentences.chinese: 根据英格兰法，外国主权者是不在英格兰法院应诉的。

definition: common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
another case (in law)/a case to treat separately
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
